rooms.description: Entry with a waiting area, includes foyer and closet.
Open-plan living and dining space connected to kitchen.
Open-plan integrated with the living area for seamless flow. Equipped with modern appliances.
Master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom.
Ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom.
Secondary bedroom with access to common corridor.
Third bedroom adjacent to secondary bedroom for privacy.

openings.details: Double door entry with window transom lights.
Large windows providing natural light and Vastu alignment with east.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with south-west facing for calm energy.
En-suite bathroom designed following Vastu principles.
Secondary bedroom with natural light from east.
Additional bedroom placed in the north-east corner as per Vastu for prosperity.

openings.details: East-facing window to encourage positivity and energy flow.
